ED_Title: Compliance with non-proliferation, arms limitation and disarmament agreements and commitments
ED_DecisionText: At its 37th plenary meeting, on 7 December 2020, the General Assembly, by a recorded vote of 177 to 1, with 9 abstentions (See A/75/PV.37 for the result of the voting.), on the recommendation of the First Committee (A/75/399, para.97.), recalling its resolution 72/32 of 4 December 2017 and previous resolutions on this matter, decided to include in the provisional agenda of its seventy-sixth session, under the item entitled “General and complete disarmament”, the sub-item entitled “Compliance with non-proliferation, arms limitation and disarmament agreements and commitments”.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
